ref: 8254 puṭakínī f. ʻ lotus ʼ Vāsav. [Formed from puṭaka -- 1 (s.v. puṭa -- ) as ʻ with cup -- shaped flower ʼ or poss., like padminī -- ʻ lotus plant ʼ from padma -- , from puṭaka -- 2 ʻ lotus ʼ lex. containing a *puṭa -- ~ *puṇḍa -- ʻ lotus ʼ (sanskritized as puṇḍra -- and in puṇḍari -- ) like pāṭala<-> ʻ pallid ʼ (MW.) ~ pāṇḍú -- with which they are perh. connected (J. C. W.)]
Pk. puḍaïṇī -- f. ʻ lotus pond ʼ;
H. poet. puraïn, ˚rain, ˚raini f. ʻ lotus, lotus leaf ʼ.
